title: Diagnostics
description: View detailed diagnostic information about your IPFS node and system configuration.

logs.title: Node Logs
logs.description: Real-time logs from your IPFS node with configurable log levels.

entries.noEntries: No log entries yet. Start streaming to see logs.
entries.tooltipGoToTop: Scroll to top of current view
entries.tooltipGoToLatest: Load and view the latest logs

debugGlobal.title: Enable Debug Logging Globally?
debugGlobal.message: You are about to enable DEBUG level logging for all subsystems. This will generate a very high volume of logs and may impact browser performance.
debugGlobal.detail1: Debug logs can generate 100+ messages per second
debugGlobal.detail2: High CPU usage and memory consumption
debugGlobal.detail3: Potential browser tab crashes or freezing
debugGlobal.suggestion1: Consider enabling debug logs for specific subsystems only
debugGlobal.suggestion2: Use for short debugging sessions (< 5 minutes)
debugGlobal.suggestion3: Monitor the log rate indicator and disable if needed

highRate.title: High Log Rate Detected
highRate.message: Current log rate is {rate} logs/second, which may cause performance issues.
highRate.detail1: High log rates can slow down the browser
highRate.suggestion1: Consider reducing log levels for busy subsystems
highRate.suggestion2: Use buffer configuration to limit memory usage

autoDisable.title: Log Streaming Auto-Disabled
autoDisable.message: Log streaming was automatically disabled due to extremely high rate ({rate} logs/sec).
autoDisable.detail1: This protects your browser from potential crashes
autoDisable.detail2: Logs are still being cached in persistent storage
autoDisable.suggestion1: Reduce log levels before re-enabling streaming
autoDisable.suggestion2: Check subsystem log levels and disable debug mode

connectivity.title: Connectivity Check
connectivity.description: Test your IPFS node's connectivity and network reachability.

checkIpfs.title: IPFS Network Check
checkIpfs.description: Verify that your node can connect to the IPFS network and is reachable by other peers.
